Description: This is a beautiful guitar with awesome tone that just never gets played. I have too many guitars and have decided to sell all but the ones that have sentimental value. The PRS S2 Standard 24, in satin finishe, has a thin, hard nitro finish that gives this instrument a wonderful resonance and an open clarity that’s noticeable even when unplugged. The 85/15 "S" pickups are ready to befriend whatever genre you feel like playing at tonight’s gig: high gain punk and metal, to warm, bassy blues. The push/pull tone control allows for coil tapping and on-the-fly versatility. For players looking for a versatile workhorse with a distinguished look, the S2 Standard 24 is a perfect choice.
